text: The epok epok stall at Heap Seng Leong is a popular spot for delicious and affordable treats. They specialize in old-school epok epok (curry puffs), offering a taste of classic Singaporean snacks. The puffs are made with fresh ingredients, resulting in a flavorful and satisfying experience.

Fresh handmade curry puffs. Generous amount of filling. Still can find those diced potato inside, not those fully mashed type.
Freshly fried.
Reasonable price.
(Potato $1.00/ Sardine $1.20)
Stall owner are really.
Best to eat over a cup of butter kopi-o
Highly recommended.

The stall closes once they finish selling the puffs. Usually by 2 or 3pm they are sold out but they can sometimes close even earlier than that. Their rest days are not fixed. I had the freshly fried potato curry puff ($1) with the rest of my meal from a neighbouring stall and it was delicious.

29/8/2024
Takeaway 1 sardine epok-epok ($1), was quite good. Located inside Heap Seng Leong coffee shop. I'll be back to try the potato version

This is my all time favourite curry puff place, whether it is to eat there while piping hot, or to takeaway to have it later and it still tastes as good. The skin is crispy and slightly flaky, and both the potatoes and sardine filling are as both satisfying. Perfect when paired with a cup of kopi at the same coffeeshop.
